name: After Twilight
description:
In 2035, a virus spread throughout the world, turning 99% of the population into hive zombies. Those that remain call them The Lost. In the day, the rays of the sun eat away their flesh, turning them to dust, but After Twilight, they roam the earth and ravage what’s left of humanity. 

Controls:

  • WASD to move 
  • Mouse rotate weapon/aim
  • Spacebar to Jump
  • Shift to sprint
  • Right Mouse Button to aim down sights
  • Left Mouse Button to shoot
  • G to throw grenade
  • F to interact with Ammo crate or Upgrade System

Competitive ranking in future update
